Name: Serpent Sentinel Sergio
Description: Hailing from the digital depths of the WebtrES club, Serpent Sentinel Sergio stands guard with military precision. Clad in the vibrant rossoCorsa, his casing gleams with an intensity that commands respect. With arms and legs engineered for combat, Sergio has the poise of a soldier, ever ready to spring into action. The snake screen that occupies his visor provides him with an uncanny ability to detect threats with heat-vision accuracy. His glasses aren't just for style; they're equipped with advanced scanning technology, allowing him to see through the most cunning of disguises. Sergio's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is rumored that he was once a lead security program for a top-secret digital fortress. Now, he dedicates himself to the protection and order of the WebtrES club, always vigilant, always steadfast.
